name: personal-hub
description: Personal AgentHub deployment (backend only - use control-plane for UI)
author: Steve James <sjames@cloudflare.com>

scripts.deploy: SANDBOX=1 npm run build && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:activate: wrangler versions deploy $(wrangler versions list --name agents-hub --json 2>/dev/null | node -e "const d=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('/dev/stdin','utf8'));console.log(d[d.length-1]?.id);")@100% --yes -c dist/agents_hub/wrangler.json
